content: **free version of this pattern available as a video tutorial click visit pattern website link above** crochet mesh sleeves pattern available with stitch count for sizes xs/sm sm/med med/lg lg/xl materials used - 5mm crochet hook - soft & shiny yarn by loops & threads 2 skeins - scissors & yarn needle terms used - chain = chain - single_crochet = single_crochet - double_crochet = double_crochet - slip_stitch = slip_stitch
